title: Local Hour: Spiced Up Wednesdays!
description:
Things get a little "Spiced Up" on a Wednesday as the Marlins hire a new manager, Tony thinks he can beat everyone at everything, how good is Tua and where is the southernmost ice skating rink in the United States?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
